messages.title: Liberal Democrats are winning for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats: Run many of our big cities including Hull, Bristol, Liverpool and Sheffield. Won more votes than Labour in Beverley and Holderness in the last local elections. Held 63 seats in the last parliament. Can deliver real change across Britain today.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and the Liberal Democrats are winning support across Britain.

leaflet.additionalNotes:
Help the Lib Dems win.
Please help Craig Dobson and the local Lib Dems win for local people by filling in and returning this form - or ring 01482 860022.
